title: Hushed makes a second phone number easy and affordable
content:
Macworld

Admit it…when you find out someone has a second private telephone number, you immediately jump to nefarious conclusions. But the reality is phone numbers have become a common target for retailers, scammers, and annoying callers of all kinds, trying to grab your attention (at best) or get something from you (at worst).

Your phone number is a sought-after piece of information. So to reduce the number of unwanted calls and manage who contacts you, a modern solution is to safeguard yourself with a service like Hushed Private Phone Line.

Hushed provides a secure secondary phone line with a customizable number, including any area code of your choice. Whether you handle business calls, engage in online business activities, or simply want to communicate on your terms, this separate number can help you segregate your calls effectively, keeping your primary line exclusively for close family and friends.

You can message or speak on the phone while preserving your online privacy without the need for an additional costly phone plan. Even for those navigating the dating scene who prefer not to have random strangers from Tinder and Bumble calling, Hushed offers an effective solution to redirect those connections and keep yourself protected.

Currently, you can grab a lifetime subscription to Hushed, including up to 6,000 SMS or 1,000 phone minutes per year at nearly 90% off its regular price, just $19.99. Just use the coupon code SECURE20 during checkout to get the additional 20% off if you make your purchase by 11:59 p.m. PT on Apr. 7.
